page.title: 20Lullington Church
page.content:
Lullington Church stands on a hill above the River Cuckmere. It can be reached by way of the White Bridge near Alfriston Church,a pleasant walk taking about fifteen minutes. It is one of the smallest churches in the country. The church was damaged by fire and only half of it now remains.
It is now united with Alfriston Church and services occur at regular periods.
{Credits This was a most enjoyable project done by Form 1R,Willingdon School, Eastbourne. We would like to thank all those people who have helped by giving information.
